name: Style Paint Magic
description:
About Paint Magic

Please read! :)

This is a Textual Inversion trained via DreamArtist on a single image. It is my fourth textual inversion release!

This textual inversion is a lot more subtle than my other ones. You need to be prompting correctly to use it...as it won't just automatically turn everything into paint. It works FANTASTIC with Controlnet! Especially using images that have wild-flowing hair or animals. Some display images were used with Controlnet!

Style PNMagic

It also combines well with other embeddings, one of my favorite combinations is my Nebula Magic with it. So, I have gone ahead and combined them both into one textual inversion for you!

Anyway, I hope those that use it are able to find some fun uses for it. Just remember that it's a lot more subtle than my other Textual Inversions and you'll need to prompt around it. Feel free to ask me any questions here or on discord (I'm on the CivitAI discord) if you need help!
